title: Posts on 鄒子妍 ZOU Ziyan

items.title: My name
items.content_html:
How to pronouce my name?

The IPA version of my name in Mandarin has been shown below:

邹 /tsoʊ55/ # the traditional character of my surname is “鄒”

子 /tsɯ21/ # it contains a Mandarin half Tone3 sandhi

妍 /jɛn35/ # it means beauty which comes from my father’s 3-day efforts on looking up the dictionary after my birth
